Text.Page:
The Gutrends have the cattle so nervous they'll no longer eat what we have available here. I know they'll eat Sweet Hayblossom, but the only place to collect it is over by those Gutrends.

I can't go over there or I'll die, but if you could gather some...why, you could save the village!

Oh! I can smell it from here! This should calm them down and get them eating again.

I can't thank you enough.
How did it go? Did you find the hay?
